text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump What about those of us permanantly out of work due to COVID? How will you help the millions of us who worked for companies filing for bankruptcy or closing for good? @realDonaldTrump How will you help me, a single mother who can't find work? https://t.co/GRIcxAKe59
